name: Untitled Run Gun
description:
First ever game created by me after some time studying the Godot Engine.

It was fun creating this small project. Thanks to the community for assets, and Thank YOU for playing.

Inspired by Metal Slug

Arrows to move

X to Shoot

C to Jump

Walk up and shoot to Melee

=====================================================

Art Asset Pack:

https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-run-n-gun
